Name: DPS PRESSURIZATION
checklistText:
<size=21>DPS PRESSURIZATION & CHECKOUT</size>

1.
PANEL 8:	ED:
	MASTER ARM sw - ON
	DES PRPLNT ISOL VLV sw - FIRE
	DES START He PRESS sw - FIRE
	MASTER ARM sw - OFF

2.	HELIUM MON sel - AMB PRESS
	MPS: HELIUM ind - 200 to 1100 psia

3.	HELIUM MON sel - SUPCRIT PRESS
	MPS: HELIUM ind - 750 to 1230 psia

4.	PRPLNT TEMP/PRESS MON sw - DES 1
	MPS:
		FUEL TEMP ind - 50 to 90 F
		OXID TEMP ind - 50 to 90 F
		FUEL PRESS ind - 200 to 250 psia
		OXID PRESS ind - 200 to 250 psia

5.	PRPLNT TEMP/PRESS MON sw - DES 2
	MPS:
		FUEL TEMP ind - 50 to 90 F
		OXID TEMP ind - 50 to 90 F
		FUEL PRESS ind - 200 to 250 psia
		OXID PRESS ind - 200 to 250 psia

6.	PRPLNT TEMP/PRESS MON sw - DES 1
